title: BRIEF-Vintage Energy Expects To Continue To Have Negative Operating Cash Flows
text:
BRIEF-Vintage Energy Expects To Continue To Have Negative Operating Cash Flows

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Oct 29, 2019 10:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Vintage Energy Expects To Continue To Have Negative Operating Cash Flows Oct 29 (Reuters) - Vintage Energy Ltd : * EXPECTS TO CONTINUE TO HAVE NEGATIVE OPERATING CASH FLOWS UNTIL SUCH TIME AS IT EITHER ACQUIRES OIL AND GAS PRODUCTION ASSETS * VINTAGE ENERGY LTD SEES ESTIMATED EXPENDITURE BY END OF MARCH 2020 OF ABOUT $14.5 MILLION IN TOTAL OVER PERIOD OF Q2 & Q3 FY20

BRIEF-Vintage Energy Expects To Continue To Have Negative Operating Cash Flows
